verses.verse: Beginning <S%G746><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Glad Tidings <S%G2098><s%> Of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God; <S%G2316><s%>

As <S%G5613><s%> It Has Been Written <S%G1125><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> , Prophets, <S%G4396><s%> , Behold, <S%G2400><s%> I 1473 P-1NS Send 649 V-PAI-1S 3588 T-ASM 32 N-ASM My Messenger 3450 P-1GS Before 4253 PREP 4383 N-GSN Thy Face, 4675 P-2GS Who 3739 R-NSM Shall Prepare 2680 V-FAI-3S 3588 T-ASF 3598 N-ASF Thy Way 4675 P-2GS Before 1715 PREP, Thee. 4675 P-2GS

The Voice <S%G5456><s%> Of One Crying <S%G994><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Wilderness, <S%G2048><s%> Prepare <S%G2090><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Way <S%G3598><s%> Of The Lord, <S%G2962><s%> Straight <S%G2117><s%> Make <S%G4160><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Paths <S%G5147><s%> His. <S%G846><s%>

Came <S%G1096><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> Baptizing <S%G907><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Wilderness, <S%G2048><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Proclaiming <S%G2784><s%> The Baptism <S%G908><s%> Of Repentance <S%G3341><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> Remission <S%G859><s%> Of Sins. <S%G266><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Went Out <S%G1607><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Of Judea <S%G2449><s%> Country, <S%G5561><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They <S%G3588><s%> Of Jerusalem, <S%G2415><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Were Baptized <S%G907><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Jordan <S%G2446><s%> River <S%G4215><s%> ' By <S%G5259><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> Confessing <S%G1843><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G266><s%> Their Sins. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G2258><s%> And Was <S%G1161><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> Clothed In <S%G1746><s%> Hair <S%G2359><s%> Of A Camel, <S%G2574><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> A Girdle <S%G2223><s%> Of Leather <S%G1193><s%> About <S%G4012><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3751><s%> His Loins, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Eating <S%G2068><s%> Locusts <S%G200><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Honey <S%G3192><s%> Wild. <S%G66><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Proclaimed, <S%G2784><s%> , Saying, <S%G3004><s%> He Comes <S%G2064><s%> Who Is <S%G3588><s%> Mightier <S%G2478><s%> Than I 3450 P-1GS After 3694 ADV Me, 3450 P-1GS Of Whom 3739 R-GSM 3756 PRT-N I Am Not 1510 V-PXI-1S Fit 2425 A-NSM Having Stooped Down 2955 V-AAP-NSM To Loose 3089 V-AAN The 3588 T-ASM Thong 2438 N-ASM 3588 T-GPN 5266 N-GPN Of His Sandals. 846 P-GSM

I 1473 P-1NS Indeed 3303 PRT Baptized 907 V-AAI-1S You 5209 P-2AP With 1722 PREP Water, 5204 N-DSN 846 P-NSM But He 1161 CONJ Will Baptize 907 V-FAI-3S You 5209 P-2AP With The 1722 PREP Spirit 4151 N-DSN Holy. 40 A-DSN

And <S%G2532><s%> It Came To Pass <S%G1096><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Those <S%G1565><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Days That <S%G2250><s%> Came <S%G2064><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> From <S%G575><s%> Nazareth <S%G3478><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Galilee, <S%G1056><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Was Baptized <S%G907><s%> By <S%G5259><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> In <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Jordan. <S%G2446><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Immediately <S%G2112><s%> Going Up <S%G305><s%> From <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Water, <S%G5204><s%> He Saw <S%G1492><s%> Parting Asunder <S%G4977><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heavens, <S%G3772><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> As <S%G5616><s%> A Dove <S%G4058><s%> Descending <S%G2597><s%> ' Upon <S%G1909><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> A Voice <S%G5456><s%> Came <S%G1096><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heavens, <S%G3772><s%> Thou <S%G4771><s%> Art <S%G1488><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5207><s%> My Son <S%G3450><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Beloved, <S%G27><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> I Have Found Delight. <S%G2106><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> Immediately <S%G2117><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Drives Out <S%G1544><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Wilderness. <S%G2048><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Was <S%G2258><s%> There <S%G1563><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Wilderness <S%G2048><s%> Days <S%G2250><s%> Forty, <S%G5062><s%> Tempted <S%G3985><s%> By <S%G5259><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Satan, <S%G4567><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Was <S%G2258><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Beasts; <S%G2342><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Angels <S%G32><s%> Ministered <S%G1247><s%> To Him. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G3326><s%> And After <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Was Delivered Up <S%G3860><s%> <S%G3588><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> Came <S%G2064><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Galilee, <S%G1056><s%> Proclaiming <S%G2784><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Glad Tidings <S%G2098><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Kingdom <S%G932><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God, <S%G2316><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3004><s%> Saying, <S%G3754><s%> Has Been Fulfilled <S%G4137><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Time, <S%G2540><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Has Drawn Near <S%G1448><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Kingdom <S%G932><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God; <S%G2316><s%> Repent, <S%G3340><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Believe <S%G4100><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Glad Tidings. <S%G2098><s%>

<S%G4043><s%> And Walking <S%G1161><s%> By <S%G3844><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sea <S%G2281><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Galilee <S%G1056><s%> He Saw <S%G1492><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Andrew <S%G406><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Brother <S%G80><s%> Of Him <S%G846><s%> Casting <S%G906><s%> A Large Net <S%G293><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sea; <S%G2281><s%> <S%G2258><s%> For They Were <S%G1063><s%> Fishers. <S%G231><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> Come <S%G1205><s%> After <S%G3694><s%> Me, <S%G3450><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> I Will Make <S%G4160><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> To Become <S%G1096><s%> Fishers <S%G231><s%> Of Men. <S%G444><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> Immediately <S%G2112><s%> Having Left <S%G863><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1350><s%> , Their Nets <S%G846><s%> They Followed <S%G190><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Gone On <S%G4260><s%> Thence <S%G1564><s%> A Little <S%G3641><s%> He Saw <S%G1492><s%> James <S%G2385><s%> The Son <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Zebedee, <S%G2199><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G80><s%> His Brother, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> These Were <S%G846><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ship <S%G4143><s%> Mending <S%G2675><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Nets. <S%G1350><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Immediately <S%G2112><s%> He Called <S%G2564><s%> Them; <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Left <S%G863><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3962><s%> Their Father <S%G846><s%> Zebedee <S%G2199><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ship <S%G4143><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Hired Servants, <S%G3411><s%> They Went Away <S%G565><s%> After <S%G3694><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> They Go <S%G1531><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> Capernaum; <S%G2584><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Immediately <S%G2112><s%> On The <S%G3588><s%> Sabbaths <S%G4521><s%> Having Entered <S%G1525><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Synagogue <S%G4864><s%> He Taught. <S%G1321><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> They Were Astonished <S%G1605><s%> At <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1322><s%> His Teaching : <S%G846><s%> <S%G2258><s%> For He Was <S%G1063><s%> Teaching <S%G1321><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Authority <S%G1849><s%> Having, <S%G2192><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Scribes. <S%G1122><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> There Was <S%G2258><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4864><s%> Their Synagogue <S%G846><s%> A Man <S%G444><s%> With <S%G1722><s%> <S%G4151><s%> An Unclean Spirit, <S%G169><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Cried Out, <S%G349><s%>

Saying, <S%G3004><s%> , Ah! <S%G1436><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> To Us <S%G2254><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> , To Thee, <S%G4671><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> ; Nazarene? <S%G3479><s%> Art Thou Come <S%G2064><s%> To Destroy <S%G622><s%> ; Us? <S%G2248><s%> I Know <S%G1492><s%> Thee <S%G4571><s%> Who <S%G5101><s%> Thou Art, <S%G1488><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Holy One <S%G40><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God. <S%G2316><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Rebuked <S%G2008><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> , Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Be Silent, <S%G5392><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Come Forth <S%G1831><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Thrown Into Convulsions <S%G4682><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Unclean, <S%G169><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Cried <S%G2896><s%> With A Voice <S%G5456><s%> Loud, <S%G3173><s%> Came Forth <S%G1831><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Were Astonished <S%G2284><s%> , All, <S%G3956><s%> So That <S%G5620><s%> They Questioned Together <S%G4802><s%> Among <S%G4314><s%> , Themselves, <S%G846><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> This? <S%G5124><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Teaching <S%G1322><s%> <S%G3588><s%> New <S%G2537><s%> , This, <S%G3778><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> ' With <S%G2596><s%> Authority <S%G1849><s%> Even <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Spirits <S%G4151><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Unclean <S%G169><s%> He Commands, <S%G2004><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Obey <S%G5219><s%> Him! <S%G846><s%>

<S%G1831><s%> And Went Out <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Fame <S%G189><s%> Of Him <S%G846><s%> Immediately <S%G2117><s%> In <S%G1519><s%> All <S%G3650><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Around Country <S%G4066><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Galilee. <S%G1056><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Immediately <S%G2112><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Synagogue <S%G4864><s%> Having Gone Forth <S%G1831><s%> They Came <S%G2064><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> House <S%G3614><s%> Of Simon <S%G4613><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Andrew, <S%G406><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> James <S%G2385><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> John. <S%G2491><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And The <S%G1161><s%> Mother - In - Law <S%G3994><s%> Of Simon <S%G4613><s%> Was Lying <S%G2621><s%> In A Fever. <S%G4445><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Immediately <S%G2112><s%> They Speak <S%G3004><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> About <S%G4012><s%> Her. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Come To Her <S%G4334><s%> He Raised Up <S%G1453><s%> Her, <S%G846><s%> Having Taken <S%G2902><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5495><s%> Her Hand. <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Left <S%G863><s%> Her <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Fever <S%G4446><s%> , Immediately, <S%G2112><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> She Ministered <S%G1247><s%> To Them. <S%G846><s%>

Evening <S%G3798><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> Being Come, <S%G1096><s%> When <S%G3753><s%> Went Down <S%G1416><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sun, <S%G2246><s%> They Brought <S%G5342><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Ill <S%G2560><s%> Were <S%G2192><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Those <S%G3588><s%> Possessed By Demons; <S%G1139><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> City <S%G4172><s%> Whole <S%G3650><s%> Gathered Together <S%G1996><s%> Was <S%G2258><s%> At <S%G4314><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Door. <S%G2374><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Healed <S%G2323><s%> Many <S%G4183><s%> <S%G2560><s%> That Were Ill <S%G2192><s%> Of Various <S%G4164><s%> Diseases, <S%G3554><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Demons <S%G1140><s%> Many <S%G4183><s%> He Cast Out, <S%G1544><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Suffered Not <S%G863><s%> To Speak <S%G2980><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Demons, <S%G1140><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> They Knew <S%G1492><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Very Early <S%G4404><s%> <S%G1773><s%> While Yet Night <S%G3029><s%> Having Risen Up <S%G450><s%> He Went Out <S%G1831><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Departed <S%G565><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> Desert <S%G2048><s%> A Place, <S%G5117><s%> And There <S%G2546><s%> Was Praying. <S%G4336><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> Went After <S%G2614><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Those <S%G3588><s%> ' With <S%G3326><s%> Him; <S%G846><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> Having Found <S%G2147><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> They Say <S%G3004><s%> <S%G846><s%> To Him, <S%G3754><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Seek <S%G2212><s%> Thee. <S%G4571><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Says <S%G3004><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> Let Us Go <S%G71><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Neighbouring <S%G2192><s%> Country Towns, <S%G2969><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> There Also <S%G2546><s%> I May Preach; <S%G2784><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> Because <S%G1063><s%> Have I Come Forth. <S%G1831><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Was <S%G2258><s%> Preaching <S%G2784><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4864><s%> Their Synagogues <S%G846><s%> In <S%G1519><s%> All <S%G3650><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Galilee, <S%G1056><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Demons <S%G1140><s%> Casting Out. <S%G1544><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Comes <S%G2064><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> A Leper, <S%G3015><s%> Beseeching <S%G3870><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Kneeling Down To <S%G1120><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Saying <S%G3004><s%> <S%G846><s%> To Him, <S%G3754><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> Thou Wilt <S%G2309><s%> Thou Art Able <S%G1410><s%> Me <S%G3165><s%> To Cleanse. <S%G2511><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Being Moved With Compassion, <S%G4697><s%> Having Stretched Out His <S%G1614><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Hand <S%G5495><s%> He Touched <S%G680><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Says <S%G3004><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> I Will, <S%G2309><s%> Be Thou Cleansed. <S%G2511><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2036><s%> He Having Spoken, <S%G846><s%> Immediately <S%G2112><s%> Departed <S%G565><s%> ' From <S%G575><s%> , Him <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Leprosy, <S%G3014><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Was Cleansed. <S%G2511><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> Having Strictly Charged <S%G1690><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> Immediately <S%G2112><s%> He Sent Away <S%G1544><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Says <S%G3004><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> See <S%G3708><s%> To No One <S%G3367><s%> Anything (lit. Nothing) <S%G3367><s%> Thou Speak; <S%G2036><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> Go, <S%G5217><s%> Thyself <S%G4572><s%> Shew <S%G1166><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Priest, <S%G2409><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Offer <S%G4374><s%> For <S%G4012><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2512><s%> Thy Cleansing <S%G4675><s%> What <S%G3739><s%> Ordered <S%G4367><s%> , Moses, <S%G3475><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> A Testimony <S%G3142><s%> To Them. <S%G846><s%>
